Text: Macro FeedbackAll We are already down a quarter of the Macro course and youd have got a sense of the class weekend sections and the homework etc As the class rep I would like to solicit your feedbackcomments to shapeimprove the remainder of this course In particular send me aas or Cathy aas your thoughts on Class topicsdiscussions participation issues Homework whether would you like it to be assessed What would you like to see in the sections how should it be done Class noteshandouts newspaper articles Some of you had expressed concern over broad nature of class discussions and how to crystallize this for the final exam Anymore issues on the Final Whether you would like a midterm Coverage of sample exam questions during the section Final exam review sessions andor anything else that you feel needs to be addressed Thanks Suresh PS To clear the air I am NOT going to enforce late fee for the Monday section Since it was agreed upon by the class and it is for charity I would like this to be voluntary atthtm
